movies.title: Fastlife
movies.plot: FASTLIFE: always go further, faster, to shine in the eyes of others: this is the motto of Franklin. Franklin is a megalomaniac obsessed by the desire to shine at any price. He will have to choose between becoming a man or continue to live the Fastlife...

biography.bio: Thomas N'Gijol is an actor and writer, known for Le grand journal de Canal+ (2004), La rentrée des émissions (2012) and Case départ (2011).
biography.name: Thomas N'Gijol

biography.bio: Karole Rocher was born in 1974 in Bezons, Val-d'Oise, France. She is an actress and director, known for Polisse (2011), Stella (2008) and Les neiges du Kilimandjaro (2011).
biography.name: Karole Rocher

biography.bio: Like many actors, Julien Boisselier began in theater and then in the series he shot for the first time for television " Group Night " . Noticed in 1996 in the saga summer France 2 " In a large wind flowers", then revealed in the TV movie " Willingly or unwillingly ," the actor had no trouble seducing viewers ... It then turns many dramas "Summer beetles ", " The second truth ", " The Night of Murder ", " The one who left" ... Since then, he landed his first role in 2000 in " N7 " . Immediately after " Clara et moi ", " J'me not feel beautiful ", " We're going to love ", " It's a pleasure for me," " Please Do not you worry goest ",and roles, like Charles Gaessler , a young mentally disabled man in 2006 in the TV movie " Flowers for Algernon " in which he is particularly moving . In 2010, he plays Henry IV and, in a comedy "In the happiness of men." In 2011, he appeared in the series " Death at Edelweiss" with Claire Keim and continues with the series of TF1 " Cheers Colo " alongside Virginia Hocq and Titoff ,also in the film "White Night " by Frédéric Jardin alongside Tomer Sisley and Joey Starr. And in 2012 " The Chef " Daniel Cohen with Michael Youn and Jean Reno . In 2012, he also turns to France 2 " Brothers and Sisters" , a TV movie with Arbillot Pascale and Thierry Frémont . Film on TV, from comedy to drama , he can play everything and loves above all the diversity of roles .
biography.name: Julien Boisselier

biography.bio: Yasit Ait Hamoudi is an actor, known for Fastlife (2014), La petite Lilia (2009) and Hippolyte et le secret du professeur Grobus (2001).
biography.name: Yasit Ait Hamoudi

biography.bio: Olivier Marchal started taking acting lessons when he still was a police officer. He began his career in television, appearing in supporting parts or writing scripts for detective TV series. In 1989 when Yves Rénier resurrected his TV series Commissaire Moulin (1976) he became his partner as scriptwriter, series supervisor and sometimes actor. In 2000 he starred as Commandant Pierre Rivière in his own TV series _"Police district" (1999)_, written by novelist Hugues Pagan, himself also a former police officer.
biography.name: Olivier Marchal

biography.bio: Clément Moreau is an actor, known for Fastlife (2014), L'homme de ses rêves (2012) and Foudre (2007).
biography.name: Clément Moreau

biography.bio: Olivia is an LA based actress, daughter of a French and British private duty nurse and a Gabonese ambassador, she was born in Paris and spent her childhood between Great Britain, South Korea and South Africa. After getting a high school diploma in Literature she went back to Paris to study communication. She then moved to the U.K and obtained a Master in Governance and Public Policy from the University of Sheffield with distinction. Following a job interview in London she decided to devote herself to her passion: theater. After a short stop by the Paris XVIIIth district's Conservatory she was accepted at the Théâtre de L'Oeuvre workshop under the teaching of Niels Arestrup. During the summer 2013 Olivia got her first roles in feature films after less than a year of training. In 419 she plays a Nigerian prostitute alongside Liya Kebede, Adel Ben Cherif and Richard Bohringer. In Fast Life she plays Leslie, a high-level athlete alongside Karole Rocher and Thomas N'Gijol. Both films will be released in 2014.
biography.name: Olivia Biffot

biography.bio: Kaaris was born on January 30, 1980 in Cocody, Côte d'Ivoire. He is an actor and composer, known for Braqueurs (2015), Fastlife (2014) and The Take (2016).
biography.name: Kaaris

biography.bio: Mexianou Medenou was born as Medenou. He is an actor, known for Fastlife (2014).
biography.name: Mexianou Medenou

biography.bio: Marthe Ndoma Ewane is an actress, known for Fastlife (2014).
biography.name: Marthe Ndoma Ewane

biography.name: Théophile Sowié

biography.bio: Major Assé is an actor, known for Fastlife (2014).

biography.bio: Mylène Wagram is an actress, known for Africa paradis (2006), La première étoile (2009) and Sheket! (2011).
biography.name: Mylène Wagram

biography.bio: David Migeot is known for his work on Violence des échanges en milieu tempéré (2003), Très bien, merci (2007) and Une preuve d'amour (2003).
biography.name: David Migeot

biography.bio: Louise Luck is an actress, known for Fastlife (2014) and Entre les lignes (2016).
biography.name: Louise Luck
